name: Clive Scott - Pay in Blood
description:
"The year was 1978, carter was president, we had the heaviest snowfall of the season, I was heading to my brother's funeral in Hamburg, PA. He passed away a successful businessman at 56, left me his estate, we hadn’t spoken in years so I was really surprised"

Pay in Blood is a PSX-era styled adventure game, in which you play as army veteran and private investigator cilve scott. Solve a murder mystery in your estranged brothers old mansion. A short yet thrilling experiance.
